Member Function Documentation

void CTWindowFrameView::DrawControlFrame (  const Control &  control,
DeviceContext *  dc,
const Rect &  repaint_rect
)  const [protected, virtual]
 

Draws the data of a frame described by the model. Must be implemented in the corresponding theme view.

Parameters:
model Model describing the data of a frame.
dc Pointer to the device context, where the drawing should be done.
repaint_rect Rectangle which indicates, where the repainting must be done.

Implements ControlFrameView.

ControlFrameView::DrawWindowExenstions

void CTWindowFrameView::SetDimensions (  XYDIM  left_size,
XYDIM  top_size,
XYDIM  right_size,
XYDIM  bottom_size,
XYDIM  title_height,
XYDIM  softkey_bar_height
) 
 

APOXI-Internal method.

This method sets the dimensions (left, right, top, bottom sizes, and titlebar and softkeybar height). It is called by CustomizableTheme from its Update(...) method. It shouldn't be necessary for application programmers to use it.
